sentence.Network_en: This was a good decision inasmuch as it worked for you.
sentence.Network_cn: 既然对你起作用，这就是个明智的决定。

sentence.Network_en: He was a very unusual musician inasmuch as he was totally deaf.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是完全失聪的，从这点上来说，他是个很了不起的音乐家。

sentence.Network_en: Inasmuch as you are their parents, you are responsible for the behaviour of these keds.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为你们是这几个孩子的父母, 你们就得对他们的行为负责.

list.abs: ...t（鉴于）, now that（既然）, given that（考虑到）, in that（因为）, inasmuch as（因为）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: originally as in as much, translating Old French en tant (que) 'in so much (as')

auth_sentence.content: That work has been completed inasmuch as it involved the Fiscal Commission working group.

auth_sentence.content: Mailer shouldn't have been surprised, inasmuch as Godard hadn't read Shakespeare's play, either.
